caption.center: PETER McARTHUR, Respondent, v. CASS COUNTY, NORTH DAKOTA, a Public

opinion.posture:
Appeal from the District Court of Case County, Grimson, Special J.
Affirmed.
opinion.attorneys:
Ralph F. Croal, State's Attorney, and Roy K. Redetzke, Assistant State's Attorney, for appellant.
Nilles, Oehlert Nilles, for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
This case involves precisely the same questions as those which were presented and determined in Re Peschel, ante, 14,4 N.W.2d 194, and on the authority of the decision in that case the judgment appealed from in this case is affirmed.
CHRISTIANSON, MORRIS, BURKE, and NUESSLE, JJ., concur.
opinion.dissent_text: I dissent on grounds stated in Peschel Case.Page 27
